settings.html:
<style>
/* 修复多图并排段落两端对齐 */
figcaption.gallery__caption.rte>p {
width: 100%;
text-align: justify;
}
/* 修改Icon大小和颜色 */
svg.icon.icon--picto-mobile,
svg.icon.icon--picto-store,
svg.icon.icon--picto-shield,
svg.icon.icon--picto-customer-support {
width: 45px;
height: 45px;
color: rgb(var(--primary-button-background))
}

/* 修复PC端多栏布局看睹 */
@media screen and (min-width: 1000px) {
shopify-section shopify-section--multi-column>.multi-column {
--item-width: calc(var(--container-inner-width) / (var(--section-items-per-row))*1.2)
}
}

@media screen and (min-width: 1000px) {
.gallery {
--gallery-image-height: calc(var(--container-inner-width) / 3.3);
padding-left: calc(var(--container-inner-width) / (1-(1/3.3))/2)
}

/* 修复图片间距 */
.gallery__list {
padding-left: calc(var(--container-inner-width)*0.0225);
}
}
</style>

settings.title: Complete Mobile Solutions for Your Business
settings.html:
Unihertz provides end-to-end mobile customization solutions, from software
design to manufacturing, that address various business needs.

settings.caption:
You Can Count on Us for
Rugged Mobile Solutions

Rugged mobile solutions are essential across multiple industries with harsh environments, where only tough smart devices can support quick and coordinated corporate responses. Unihertz has IP68-backed solutions that give you confidence in the durability and enhance operations within your business.

Solutions for Safe & Quick
Corporate Communications

At Unihertz we provide a wide range of solutions to take your corporate communication to the next level. Whether you need ultra-light compact devices or powerful smartphones with a large battery, keeping your team connected is easy with Unihertz.

QWERTY Keyboard-Based Smart Solutions
for Speedy & Accurate Operations

For professional settings where continuous, error-free typing is necessary, we have the ideal solution. Enhanced typing experience, including a faster non-error typing rate, will not only make your team more productive, but also let them truly enjoy working using upgraded smart devices.
